alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 19 at 2:40PM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MONDAY TO 5 AM MST TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph above 10000 feet. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Locally higher amounts above 10000 feet where winds gusting as high as 50 mph are possible. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow and blowing snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet possible with locally higher amounts. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 AM Monday to 5 AM MST Tuesday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Tuesday morning through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible with blowing snow significantly reduce visibility at times. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
